title: UK prime minister dealt embarrassing Brexit blow
text:
UK prime minister dealt embarrassing Brexit blow 6:16pm BST - 01:56 
Britain's upper house of parliament inflicts an embarrassing defeat on Theresa May's government, challenging her refusal to remain in a customs union with the European Union after Brexit. Elizabeth Piper reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain's upper house of parliament inflicts an embarrassing defeat on Theresa May's government, challenging her refusal to remain in a customs union with the European Union after Brexit. Elizabeth Piper reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JTNvlX
